name: Lord Slayer
description:
Bounded and enslave, the child rage against his tormentor burns deeply into his soul. The flame within his soul lure's Great Lords to him, like a moth to the flame in where his jailer cuts them down and harvest their divine power for his legion of slayers. All hope is lost for this child, his rage unheard, and his torment eternal.

Until now…

Fight back against your tormentor by using the divine power he has harvested. Armed with the divined blade crafted by the fallen lord, the child can fly, stab and slash your way to freedom and defeat the lord slayer. But beware, for the slayer of lords will brutally eradicate the child if not careful. Will, the child rage be enough to overcome these vile being?

Could this child claim victory against these slayers of lords?
